tasks.task: Mixing and loading pesticides safely (with some subtasks).

subtasks: Verify and don correct personal protective equipment (chemical-resistant gloves, safety goggles, face mask, and Tyvek suit if needed).
Follow the proper mixing sequence as per the label and guide (e.g., the apples formula), ensuring chemicals are added in the correct order.
Adhere to label warnings and understand the risks of using both restricted- and general-use pesticides.
Handle chemicals with care to avoid splashes and spills during mixing/loading.

tasks.task: Apply pesticides in accordance with label instructions.
subtasks: Use appropriate personal protective equipment as specified by the label.
Verify and don correct personal protective equipment (chemical-resistant gloves, safety goggles, face mask, and Tyvek suit if needed).
Follow the proper mixing sequence as per the label and guide (e.g., the apples formula), ensuring chemicals are added in the correct order.
Adhere to label warnings and understand the risks of using both restricted- and general-use pesticides.
Handle chemicals with care to avoid splashes and spills during mixing/loading.
